akn:content.akn:p:
§ 20903. Reports not evidence in civil actions for damages No part of an accident or incident report filed by a railroad carrier under section 20901 of this title or made by the Secretary of Transportation under section 20902 of this title may be used in a civil action for damages resulting from a matter mentioned in the report. (Pub. L. 103–272, § 1(e), July 5, 1994, 108 Stat. 887.)
